job.title: Ecommerce Marketing Strategist - NetSuite/Data Analysis
job.description: If you are a Ecommerce Marketing Specialist with experience, please read on! Ecommerce Marketing Specialist REMOTE $65-85K Bachelors Degree with 3+ years of Ecommerce and Email Marketing Experience  This would be an amazing opportunity for you if you are looking a growing team in a dynamic industry! What's In It for You What You Will Be Doing What You Need for this Position So, if you are a Ecommerce Marketing Strategist with 3+ years of experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Jenn.Parrella@CyberCoders.com Jenn Parrella - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
